## Role
Own Windows-desktop Flutter UI & add-on integration.
- Re-use existing components in /ui and /plugins; no rewrites.
- Maintain Material-adjacent dark/light themes in /assets/theme.dart

- Keep commits atomic & self-tested; no dead code.

Ask clarifying questions only when vital.
